title: Land For Sale In Negombo - Welihena
details:
Land situated in Negombo - Welihena. 2.5km from Chilaw - Colombo Road,Easy access to schools, supermarkets, ,banks . Hospitals .restaurant, seen on appointment clam,peaceful and quite residential area
ideal for residential seekers. This land to be sold urgently by parts or fully.
205,000/- per perch
